**Example 1: GetCampaignStatus**



Input: 

```
tccli zj GetSmsCampaignStatus --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --License KA3431QZPU \
    --CampaignId 101
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "Data": {
            "Status": 1
        },
        "RequestId": "7c2ce956-8b92-456c-97b5-63da7342d312"
    }
}
```
